inclusion.criterion: major complication of cirrhosis in the past
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: alcoholic cirrhosis who still consume alcohol
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: off ETOH for a year (corroborated with pt)

exclusion.criterion: chronically treated with antibiotics or lactulose
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has liver cirrhosis with past variceal bleeding and encephalopathy, and evidence of portal hypertension. No indication of ongoing alcohol use.
